pullRequest.title: Update Sections, Transits and Dispatcher
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add missing Section error message
Add an optional control sensor to the simulator script
Change messages to use display name instead of system name

commit.message: Add missing error message; add optional control sensor to simulator; change messages to use display name

nodes.bodyText:
The traininfo files contain 2 fields, the ID (aka system name) and the Name (aka a sort of display name, but not quite)
There are 2 versions of the file v1 & v2. Neither will read correctly if you make these changes, necessitating the conversion, in may case of about 30 files, and in the clubs case a few hunderd). If you want to do this you need to add a version 3, you need to go from top to bottom of the dispatcher code to ensure that nowhere is it using explicitly a systemname.

commit.message: Implement version 3 train info; change log messages to use the USERNAME_SYSTEMNAME DisplayOption
Finish USERNAME_SYSTEMNAME for log messages, fix NPE in LayoutEditorTools
